thread.title: Alexander Cremer
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por Alexander Cremer

author: Alexander Cremer
title: Alexander Cremer
text:
Everything was good as expected except for the information about the toll system device, which we wouldn't have needed to go to Porto when avoiding toll roads. Further more the deposit was 100â‚¬ more than written in reservation confirmation.
All in all Centauro was reliable, the car was in good condition and we got our deposit back within 48h!
